cross: Sarcochilus Kulnura Rusty x Sarcochilus Kulnura Rosetta

measurements.description: One hundred twenty flowers and 129 buds on 24 upright inflorescences up to 16cm in length; plant 45cm wide by 25cm high grown in a 15-cm diameter plastic azalea pot; sepals and petals white saturated burgundy basally, diffused spots distally; lip bright yellow, orange splotches; anther cap white; substance firm; texture crystalline. received AM award #20225314.
